REASONING TRACE:

THOUGHT 1: To focus on the relevant data, I will highlight the graph showing the percentage of complex sentences over the years for both parties.
<image_start>[reasoning_image_1]<image_end>
THOUGHT 2: The highlighted area contains a line graph showing the percentage of complex sentences for Democrats (blue line) and Republicans (red line) from 1960 to 2012. I can now examine the data point for 2005.
THOUGHT 3: Looking at the graph in 2005, the red line (Republicans) is clearly below the blue line (Democrats). This indicates that Republicans had a lower percentage of complex sentences in that year.

FINAL ANSWER:
